quick_context: T-001 closed: v0.2 roadmap fully defined and executed. All 17 tasks (T-001 through T-016) done - GitHub issues #1-#9 all closed. No open tasks remain. Build and tests passing (262/262). Ready for v0.3 planning.

T-001.title: Define v0.2 roadmap items as issues and prioritize

T-002.title: Expand test coverage for embedding, utils, and redaction (issue #6)

T-003.title: Add update() method to MemoryStore interface (issue #4)

T-005.title: Add TTL/expiry support for memory items

T-006.title: Add secret scanner and CI guardrails

T-007.title: Improve README with full API reference and usage examples

T-008.title: Add bulk operations and append-optimized writes (addMany)

T-009.title: v0.2: add bulk operations and append-optimized writes
T-009.notes:
## Problem

The current `JsonlMemoryStore` has two performance limitations:

1. **No bulk operations**: Adding multiple items requires N sequential calls to `add()`, each of which reads the entire file, computes an embedding, and rewrites the full file. For importing batches of memories (e.g., migrating from another system), this is O(N^2) in file I/O.

2. **Full rewrite on every add**: Every `add()` call reads all records, appends one, and rewrites the entire file via tmp+rename. For a store wi

T-010.title: v0.2: improve README with full API reference and usage examples
T-010.notes:
## Problem

The current README is minimal (23 lines). It explains the "why" but does not document:

- How to install and import the library
- The full public API surface (all exported types, classes, and functions)
- Usage examples for each major feature (store, redaction, embedding, utils)
- The `uuid()` helper function
- The Plugin API types (CommandDefinition, ToolDefinition, PluginApi)
- Configuration options (maxItems, embedder dimensions, custom file paths)
- How to swap the embedder for a

T-011.title: v0.2: expand test coverage for embedding, utils, and redaction modules
T-011.notes: Duplicate of T-002. Already completed - 262 tests covering embedding, utils, and all 21 redaction rules. GitHub issue #6 closed.

T-012.title: v0.2: add TTL/expiry support for memory items
T-012.notes: Duplicate of T-005. Already completed - expiresAt field, ttlMs() helper, purgeExpired(), auto-filtering in get/list/search. GitHub issue #5 closed.

T-013.title: v0.2: add update() method to MemoryStore interface
T-013.notes: Duplicate of T-003. Already completed - update() with partial merge, auto re-embed on text change. GitHub issue #4 closed.

T-014.title: v0.2: injection/exfiltration test suite
T-014.notes: Duplicate of T-004. Already completed - 91 injection/exfiltration tests. GitHub issue #3 closed.

T-015.title: v0.2: secret scanner + CI guardrails
T-015.notes: Duplicate of T-006. Already completed - scan-secrets script, gitleaks config, CI pipeline. GitHub issue #2 closed.

T-016.title: v0.2: optional semantic embeddings backend
T-016.notes: Architecture already supports custom embedders via Embedder interface and createEmbedder({ custom: ... }) factory. Documented in README with OpenAI example. GitHub issue #1 closed.
